title: Image
description: An image for my personal website's filterable gallery

src.description: The source URL for the image

href.description: The link to direct the viewer to upon clicking the image

thumbnailURL.description: The link to the smaller version of the image to display on the gallery

title.description: A title for the image for display on the gallery

artist.description: The social media handle of the artist, usually prefixed with an @, displayed on the gallery

artistURL.description: A link to the artist's social media page

published.description: The date when the artwork was published

tags.description: An array of tags for the art
